pattern_1.name: VERIFICATION_SCRIPTS_WITHOUT_IMPLEMENTATIONS
pattern_1.description: 8 verification scripts for Sprint 38-42 created same day, but no Sprint 38-42 commits exist
pattern_1.evidence: verify-sprint38*.js through verify-sprint42*.js all created Nov 2
pattern_1.conclusion: Scripts copied from wrong repository - reference sprints that never happened here

pattern_2.name: BACKDATED_MIGRATIONS
pattern_2.conclusion: Migrations artificially backdated to appear legitimate

pattern_3.name: DEAD_MIDDLEWARE_INFRASTRUCTURE
pattern_3.description: Complete role-based access control system never integrated
pattern_3.conclusion: Feature copied from other repo but not integrated into this codebase

pattern_4.name: SPRINT_NUMBERING_DISCONTINUITY
pattern_4.description: Repository jumps from Sprint 37 to fabricated Sprint 33-42 claims to Sprint 43-76
pattern_4.evidence: No Sprint 33-36 commits, no Sprint 38-42 commits, only Sprint 37 exists
pattern_4.conclusion: Sprint numbers copied from wrong repository with different sprint history
